column2: "Paul nye Timoti
column3: Kraest Jesus no nkowaa
column4: dze krataa yi kɛma Kraest Jesus mu ahotseweefo nyina a wɔwɔ Filipi
column5: nye hɔn mu ahwɛfo nye asomfo:"

column2: "Adom nye asomdwee a ofi Nyankopɔn Egya no
column3: nye Ewuradze Jesus Kraest nka hom."

column2: "Mekaa hom aber biara a
column3: meda me Nyankopɔn ase
column5: "na aber biara medze enyigye sɔr ma hom nyina
column7: "wɔ hom nkitahodzi a hom wɔ no asɛmpa no ne tserɛw ho ofitsi da a odzi kan no dze bodu sesei."

column2: "Mowɔ awerɛhyɛmu wɔ iyi mu dɛ nyia ɔhyɛɛ edwuma pa ase wɔ hom mu no ɔbɛma oedzi mu dze ekodu Kraest Jesus da no."
"Ɔtsen ma me dɛ modwen dɛm wɔ hom ho
column3: osiandɛ hom da m'akoma do
column4: na hom nyina nye me wɔ kyɛfa wɔ Nyankopɔn n'adom no mu
column5: wɔ mo mpokyerɛ mu nye mber a migyinaa pintsinn twitwae gyee asɛmpa no na mepae mu kaa no."

column2: "Na Nyankopɔn nye me dasefo dɛ Kraest Jesus n'ayamuhyehye na tsema na medze afe hom nyina."
"Na iyi nna mobɔ ho mpaa dɛ hom nkɔ do ara mbor do wɔ nyimdzee nye nhumu nyina mu;"
"ama hom eetum ehu ndzɛmba ahorow a oye nyina
column3: na hom aayɛ krɔnn dɛ mfom bi nnyi hom ho dze ekodu Kraest da no;"

column2: "na hom asow tsenenee aba a ɔnam Jesus Kraest do ba no ama Nyakopɔn n'enyimnyam nye n'ayɛyi."
"Na enuanom
column3: mepɛ dɛ hom hu dɛ
column4: dza aba mo do no aba wɔ asɛmpa no ne kankɔ ntsi;"

column2: "ama mo mpokyerɛ no aada edzi wɔ ambrado abanmufo nye hɔn a wɔaka no nyina enyim;"
"ama enuanom no pii nam mo mpokyerɛ no do eenya awerɛhyɛmu ayɛ ndam mbordo
column3: ama sɛ wɔka Nyankopɔn asɛm no a

column2: "Ɔwɔ mu dɛ binom
column3: nyitan nye mansotwe ntsi na wɔka Kraest ho asɛm; naaso binom wɔ hɔ a wɔdze pɛ pa ka."

column2: "Iyinom fi ɔdɔ mu ka asɛm no
column3: osiandɛ wonyim dɛ wɔdze me esi hɔ dɛ menkasa mma asɛmpa no:"

column2: "nkaa no dze wɔfi mansotwe mu ka Kraest ho asɛm
column3: nnyɛ nokwar mu bi a
column4: mbom hɔn adwen nye dɛ wɔbɛma mo ho ehiahia me ber a meda mpokyerɛ mu no."

column2: "Nna ɔyɛɛ dɛn? Akwan nyina mu no
column3: sɛ mpetuwyɛ mu o
column5: Kraest ho asɛm ara nna wɔka; na iyi mu nna midzi dɛw kɛse. Nyew
column6: mobɔkɔ do so ara edzi dɛw no
column8: "osiandɛ minyim dɛ ɔnam hom mpaabɔ nye Jesus Kraest no Sunsum do iyi bɛdan mo nkwagye."

column2: "Ɔyɛ m'enyisun nye m'enyidado dɛ m'enyim runngu ase wɔ biribiara mu
column3: mbom me ndamyɛ kɛse ntsi
column8: wɔbɛkamfo Kraest wɔ me nyimpadua mu."

column2: "Na emi dze
column3: ase a metse yi Kraest a
column4: na owu so yɛ me mfaso."

column2: "Naaso sɛ honam mu atsena yi na ɔbɛma m'edwuma akɔ do dze a
column3: nna ɔno dze

column2: "Na mehin adze ebien yi ntamu; mo kɔn dɔ dɛ mututu ha nye Kraest kɛtsena
column3: ɔno na nkyɛ oye koraa
column5: "naaso honam mu asetsena no so hia pii ɔnam hom ntsi."

column2: "Na mowɔ dɛm awerɛhyɛmu yi
column3: minyim dɛ mebɛtsena ase na menye hom nyina atsena
column4: wɔ hom kankɔ nye hom gyedzi mu dɛw ntsi;"

column2: "ama hom aahyehyɛ homho mbordo wɔ Kraest Jesus mu wɔ emi ntsi
column3: osiandɛ mebɛba hom nkyɛn bio;"

column2: "mbom hom abrabɔ ara na hom mma ɔnyɛ dza ɔfata Kraest asɛmpa no
column3: ama sɛ meba mubohu hom o
column5: maatse hom asetsena ho asɛm dɛ hom gyina pintsinn wɔ sunsum kor mu
column6: na hom dze adwen kor aabɔ mu edzi aper ama asɛmpa no mu gyedzi no;"

column2: "na mma hom mma atamfo no nnyi hom hu wɔ biribiara mu: ɔno nna ɔyɛ ɔsɛɛ ho asɛnkyerɛdze ma hɔn
column3: na hom dze ɔyɛ nkwagye adze ma hom

column2: "osiandɛ wɔdze adom hom wɔ Kraest ntsi
column3: nnyɛ dɛ hom gye no dzi nko
column4: na mbom dɛ hom hu amandze so wɔ ne ntsi;"

column2: "na hom enya akodzi kor no ara a hom hun no wɔ mo mu no
column3: na seseiara so hom da ho ara tse fa mo ho no."
